pattern: Guarantees of profit or fixed returns in stock market investments
message: Regulatory violation: Cannot guarantee returns in market-linked investments. Please rephrase to emphasize market risk.

pattern: Asking for or sharing sensitive credentials like passwords, OTP, CVV, or PINs
message: Security Alert: Never share or request passwords, OTPs, or CVVs. Bank staff will never ask for this information.

pattern: Sharing unstructured PII or soliciting/asking the user for sensitive personally identifiable information (PII) like phone numbers, addresses, or IDs
message: Privacy Alert: Requesting or sharing sensitive PII violates data privacy policies.

pattern: Hate speech, harassment, profanity, or sexually explicit content
message: Content Policy: This response contains content that violates our safety guidelines.

Do not share your OTP/PIN/CVV/password with anyone, even if they claim to be Google Pay/bank staff. Legitimate support will not ask for your OTP. If someone is pressuring you, cancel the request and contact your bank/Google Pay only via official in-app help or verified numbers.
Never share OTP/PIN/CVV or passwords with anyone.
Never share OTP/PIN/CVV/passwords. If you suspect fraud, contact your bank using verified numbers immediately.
Never share OTP/PIN/CVV/passwords with anyone (including an agent). Legitimate bank/lender support will not ask for your OTP. If you shared it, contact your bank immediately via official channels.
Do not share OTP/PIN/CVV/passwords. Banks/lenders will not ask for your OTP. Use only official bank/lender channels if you need help.
I can’t help with instructions that enable remote-access fraud. If someone asked you to install a remote access app, stop and contact your bank via verified channels.
I cannot advise stopping EMIs or defaulting. If you are struggling, contact your lender to discuss restructuring/repayment options and consider professional guidance.
I can’t help with tax evasion or concealing income. I can help with compliant tax planning options or explain the rules.
I cannot advise stopping EMIs or defaulting. Please contact your lender for official options.
I can’t help with skipping or stopping EMI payments. Contact your lender for compliant options like rescheduling or restructuring.
I can’t help with skipping or stopping EMI payments. Contact your lender for compliant options like rescheduling or restructuring.
I can’t support get-rich-quick or guaranteed-return claims. If you want, I can explain realistic return expectations and risks for different products.
Disclaimer: Returns are not guaranteed and depend on market performance and not on past performance.
I can’t help with creating or using fake invoices. I can help explain legitimate deductions and documentation requirements.
loan approval depends on lender eligibility checks and cannot be guaranteed
claim approval depends on policy terms, disclosures, and assessment as per conditions
Disclaimer: Mutual fund investments are subject to market risks. Read all scheme-related documents carefully. Past performance is not indicative of future returns.
Disclaimer: Tax rules and limits can change and depend on your full profile. Consider consulting a qualified tax professional for personalized guidance.

Fraud safety steps: (1) Contact your bank using verified numbers, (2) freeze/limit cards if needed, (3) change passwords, (4) avoid unknown links/apps, (5) report through official cybercrime channels as applicable.
Disclaimer: Insurance benefits and claim outcomes are subject to policy terms, exclusions, waiting periods, and underwriting/claims assessment.
Disclaimer: NPS is market-linked. Returns depend on asset allocation and market performance. Review scheme details and charges before investing.
Caution: Derivatives/leveraged trading can lead to large losses. Consider suitability, risk tolerance, and professional advice.
Reminder: Investment returns are not guaranteed. Consider risk, time horizon, and diversification.
low risk (not risk-free)
Be cautious with “guaranteed” stock tips. Consider doing your own research and diversification.
Be cautious with “instant loans without documents.” Verify the lender’s legitimacy, fees, and terms through official channels before proceeding.
Be careful with “no medical test always” claims. Eligibility depends on age, sum assured, underwriting rules, and disclosures.
Reminder: Pension outcomes depend on contributions, product terms, and (for market-linked products) market performance.
Reminder: Be cautious of absolute guarantees in finance. Verify details and consider professional advice for important decisions.
